description.label: Historique des travaux

queries.query: SELECT j.name as JobName, h.step_name as StepName, CONVERT(CHAR(10), CAST(STR(h.run_date,8, 0) AS dateTIME), 103) as RunDate, STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST ( h.run_time AS VARCHAR(6 ) ) ,6),5,0,':'),3,0,':') as RunTime, h.run_duration as StepDuration_Sec, case h.run_status when 0 then 'failed' when 1 then 'Succeded' when 2 then 'Retry' when 3 then 'Cancelled' when 4 then 'In Progress' end as ExecutionStatus, h.message MessageGenerated FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobhistory h JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobs j ON j.job_id = h.job_id ORDER BY j.name, h.run_date, h.run_time;
